subject: Re: What do you guys think of this?
author: lanmonkey_1999
full_text:
Agreed.  They must get a bulk discount at lessemf.com, that's a great
price for the two packaged items...

Mini Audio Amplifier 277-1008 $18.19
http://www.radioshack.com/product/index.jsp?productId=2062620
and
Recorder Telephone Pickup  44-533   $7.99
http://www.radioshack.com/product/index.jsp?productId=2103876

Total Radio Shack Price: $26.18

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ourobouros2k2" <ourobouros2k2@...> wrote:
>
> This is the same setup labeled "budget buzz stick" on lessemf.com 
> Essentially just a pickup/speaker. I can see no connection with an 
> actual Frank's box, or even the technology.
